flowTalkText: Ever since I started on birth control (Nexplanon, the arm implant), I have been getting my period once every two months. Do you think this will affect my body chemistry and have future damage on my female parts?

comment.text: interacting so i can know the answer too
comment.author: annielnguyen

flowTalkText: I hate the start of the cycle. As expected, the worst of the cramps, bloating and tenderness have begun and the only comfort that eases it all is the ball I curl up into. The fetal position seems to govern my every move at this point. Gunna try to sleep it away.

comment.text: My favorite thing is my huggable. It's a stuffed animal that you can microwave and use as a heat pack! It's helped so much. Also my mom reccommends ginseng tea
comment.author: jamieatsrice
